post.description: By default testMode is false to retrieve production data.To retrieve the test data user has to pass the query string as testMode=true. Search to retrieve a set of document ids based on upload date range, attachment control number, patient first name, last name , member id , provider id , provider first name , organization name, claim service start date and claim service end date

startUploadDate.description: Filter to search document based on given document upload start date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ. Timestamp is optional and defaults to T00:00:00.000Z

endUploadDate.description: Filter to search document based on given document upload end date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ. Timestamp is optional and defaults to T23:59:59.999Z

attachmentControlNumber.description: Filter to search document based on given claim number.

patientFirstName.description: Filter to search document based on given patient first name.

patientLastName.description: Filter to search document based on given patient last name.

memberId.description: Filter to search document based on given member id.

providerFirstName.description: Filter to search document based on given provider first name.

organizationName.description: Filter to search document based on given provider last name or organization name.

providerId.description: Filter to search document based on given provider id

beginClaimServiceDate.description: Filter to search document based on given claim service start date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-dd

endClaimServiceDate.description: Filter to search document based on given claim service end date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-dd

size.description: Return the number of records to display in the UI

get.summary: Download a document for the given documentId
